message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $12,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Can you meet me halfway?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product is worth significantly more to me. I could go down to $11,000.  This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $9,500. Can you consider that?
